events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund since the customer requests money back for the incorrect product.
Support agent Jessica has been assigned to handle the refund request for the order mix-up.
Hello! I’m Jessica from customer support. I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number? This will help us process your refund faster.
Sure, I’ve attached a photo of the wrong item and my order number is 123456. Please let me know what the next steps are.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days. No need to return the wrong item.
Great, thank you for the quick response and the no-return policy. That’s very convenient.
The refund process has been completed on our side. You should see the refunded amount in your account soon.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since the refund was received and there are no further issues, we have now closed your support case. Thank you for reaching out!
